entry.title: Brach's Candy Corn - 11oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 4.99

The Classic Festive Candy!

     A timeless treat, these pieces of Brach's Classic Candy Corn are as yummy as the real honey that's used to make them! Get ready for Halloween by stocking up on this nostalgic candy that makes every autumn a little bit sweeter.

11oz / 312g | 1 bulk bag

entry.title: Millions Vimto Remix - 35g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Millions
Type: Candy
Price: 1.99

A Delicious Collab Between Millions and Vimto

     These little drops are intensely juicy and full of flavour, Millions and Vimto did quite the bang-up job! Get the real fruit juice flavour of Mango, Strawberry, and Pineapple in every bite. 

     Make sure to share the Remix experience! Any fan of tropical fruity flavours needs to try these delicious sweets.

  • Natural Colour
  • Contains Real Fruit Juice

 

35g | 1 pouch

entry.title: Reese's Fast Break Bar King Size - 3.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.49

A Better Way to Enjoy Reese's!

     A Candy District staff pick! This delicious chocolate bar takes Reese's to the next level; a layer of nougat rests underneath a thick center of Reese's Peanut Butter, all wrapped up in a smooth chocolate exterior. It only takes one bite to fall in love with this truly chewy, nutty, and chocolatey experience.

     This king-sized bar was designed for sharing, but we won't judge you when you eat it all in one go! 

3.5oz / 99g | 1 king sized bar

entry.title: Galaxy Minstrels Big Bag - 66g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.29

Simply the Smoothest!

     For the most luxurious chocolate on a dime, Galaxy is a UK specialty you don't want to miss out on! Their Minstrels consist of silky smooth milk chocolate wrapped in a decadent candy shell﻿, like M&M's but so much better. A few bites in and you'll be wondering how you went your whole life without having tried them before!

     Take your tastebuds on an adventure to a different land and introduce them to the mesmerizing taste of smooth Galaxy chocolate; they deserve it. Just don't forget to share!

66g | 1 pouch

entry.title: Revels - 35g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

The Treat That's Never Boring!

     If you're looking for something to spice up your late-night munchies stash, we've got just the treat for you! 

     Revels is a smooth chocolatey treat we imported straight from the UK with a fun surprise. Each bite-sized morsel has a different center every time! It's always a guessing game when you pop another into your mouth. Will you taste orange? Coffee? Raisin? Maybe you get a plain chocolate dud here and there, but there's the potential for Malteser or even creamy toffee! 

     Sounds like something that could only be thought up by Willy Wonka or a game show host! If you're a fan of variety or mystery, this is the perfect snack for you. 

35g | 1 pouch

entry.title: Galaxy Smooth Orange Bar - 42g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.99

Simply the Smoothest!

     For the most luxurious chocolate on a dime, Galaxy is a UK specialty you don't want to miss out on! Their Smooth Orange bar consists of fine milk chocolate infused with real orange oil, giving the chocolate a hint of delicious citrus flavour. 

     Take your tastebuds on an adventure to a different land and introduce them to the mesmerizing taste of a smooth Galaxy chocolate bar!

42g | 1 bar

entry.title: Nestle Munchies Milk Chocolate Roll - 51.9g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

A Delicious Sweet Brought Straight from the UK!

     If you're ever on the go and need a quick treat to brighten up your day, why not try Nestle Munchies! Buttery, crunchy cookie center wrapped in smooth caramel and then coated in a rich milk chocolate exterior, this is a chocolatey sweet with layers of deliciousness. 

     So try something new and pop a couple of Munchies in your mouth. Just a fair warning, they're highly addictive!

51.9g | 1 roll

entry.title: Kinder Chocolate with Cereal Bar UK - 24g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrero
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.29

Add a Bit of Crunch to Your Kinder Delight!

     Whether you're a fan of Kinder chocolate or you just want a deliciously creamy treat with a twist, Kinder Chocolate with Cereals is sure to pop its way into your heart!

     The silkiest smooth milk chocolate filled with a creamy milk center and then stuffed with 5 kinds of popped cereal grains (rice, buckwheat, barley, hulled wheat, and wheat), this is the kind of chocolatey delight that'll make your mouth water uncontrollably. No matter if this is your own personal treat or a gift for someone else to enjoy, it's a guaranteed smile every time!

24g | 1 bar

Imported Fresh From The UK!

entry.title: Hershey's Kisses Vampire Filled with Strawberry Creme - 9oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 9.99

⚠️ Caution ⚠️: Deliciousness Ahead

     Nothing is better than stumbling across a bowl full of Hershey's Kisses, just be careful, these ones have fangs! One bite and you'll feel a strange bloodlust take over your tastebuds, they're craving the sweet Strawberry creme that fills each of these tasty treats.

     One Kiss, ah ah ah! Two Kisses, ah ah ah! You won't be able to stop yourself from reaching for number three, ah ah ah! Just keep these away from mom, she might just faint thinking her kids really turned into bloodsucking vampires!

9oz / 255g | 1 bag

Break Open and Share!

     Open up a world full of deliciousness when you break apart every piece of this chocolate sphere! Ovation Break-A-Parts Creme de Coconut has a smooth milk chocolate shell and a creamy coconut filling, they're an absolute delight to share and indulge in. 

     So pop one of these down on the table to enjoy over after-dinner coffee and relish in the sweetness with your close friends and family.

entry.title: M&M's Cookies & Screeem - 1.41oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars Wrigley
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

Goosebump-Inducing Flavour!

     This Halloween, a terrifying treat has caused some whispered rumours to spread across the globe. They say if you clap 3 times, say its name in the mirror at night, and have 13 lit candles nearby, you'll be haunted by a big red M&M!

     M&M's Cookies & Screeem are candy-coated bites filled with chocolate and white chocolate that blend together to give you a hauntingly sweet cookies and cream flavour. You'd best eat these quickly, it might be the only way to make that scary M&M go away!

1.41oz / 40g | 1 pouch

Vendor: Taste of Nature

Price: 2.99

A Great Fluffy Treat for All!

     Hawaiian Punch Cotton Candy is a delicious fluffy treat with a juicy taste you've never experienced before! Surf the Hawaiian waves of Fruit Juicy Red flavour with every bite of this handspun candy.

     If you've ever had Hawaiian Punch chewy candy before, you'll love the same great flavour in every bag of this super sweet cotton candy. It's the perfect sweet to share with friends!

entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice

Price: 3.49

A Punch of Sour Juiciness!

     The classic taste of Sour Punch is back with a tiny twist! Sour Punch Mini Bites Rad Reds come in a variety of your favourite red fruit flavours like Strawberry, Watermelon, and Cherry. 

     Soft and chewy, these tangy snacks will wash your tastebuds with a familiar wave of juiciness in every bite. The resealable pack they come in is perfect for sharing with all your loved ones and small enough to fit in any pocket or bag!

entry.title: Oreo Salted Caramel Brownie - 12oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nabisco
Type: Snacks
Price: 11.99

Our Favourite Dessert - Now in an Oreo!

     These have got to be the tastiest Oreos we've ever tried! Salted Caramel Brownie Oreos are topped off with flakes of savoury sea salt and filled to the edges with delicious caramel and brownie flavoured creme. Yes, you read that right, Oreos topped with salt! The saltiness blends perfectly with the chocolatey cookie and flavourful creme to give you a little taste of heaven on Earth. 

     They really taste just like Salted Caramel Brownies! It's truly hard to stop at just one and believe us, we tried. Just make sure you pick up a pack soon, these are exclusive limited-edition treats that may be gone forever, so don't miss out!

12oz / 345g | 1 pack

entry.title: Chips Ahoy! Hershey's Fudge Filled Cookies
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nabisco
Type: Snacks
Price: 9.99

Only Available For a Limited Time!

     Delicious, soft, chocolate chip cookies are one of life's great pleasures, but what if you could make them even better? Thankfully Chips Ahoy! has done just that for us!

     Buttery and chewy, these cookies have a special surprise that adds a burst of rich flavour to each bite; it's Hershey's Fudge! Enjoy the smooth fudge that oozes out of each cookie, it's the kind of treat that's super hard to resist. 

     Whether you decide to eat them dipped in milk, poking out of your sundae, or all on their own, these tasty cookies filled edge-to-edge with fudge won't disappoint. You should definitely hurry, however; these cookies are a limited edition item, so grab them while they're still hot!

Pro-tip: Quickly warm these cookies up for levels of deliciousness that are unheard of!

9.6oz / 272g | 1 pack

entry.title: Kit Kat Fruity Cereal - 1.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

A Brand NEW Way to Take a Break!

     Nothing's better than the nostalgic taste of a bowl full of Froot Loops cereal on a Saturday morning. Maybe adding a delicious, crunchy wafer into the mix makes for a close second, though!

     Kit Kat has come dressed up in an all-new flavour, each bite delivering a whole bowl of Fruity Cereal flavour. Creamy creme flavoured like a bowl of Fruity Pebbles envelops the tasty wafer you love so much. So you can forget the milk and the bowl, just unwrap one of these bars to get your cereal fix!

 

1.5oz / 42g | 1 bar

Annabelle's Rocky Road Sea Salt has a soft marshmallow center, enveloped by rich dark chocolate, and topped with bits of cashews and flakes of sea salt. Indulge yourself with a little treat; although they're so delicious, it's hard to stop at just one!
